file.name: cyclic_dependency_2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Test API for GSoC project
  version: "1.0.0"
  description: |
    A cyclic dependency between cyclic_dependency_1.yaml <--> cyclic_dependency_2.yaml. jhumps's protoreflect can't
    print cyclic dependency files. The method 'CreateFileDescriptorFromSet' inside renderer.go throws an error. As far
    as I can tell gnostic-grpc is working correctly for cyclic dependencies.
paths:
  /someMethod: # Needed, otherwise gnostic gives error
    get:
      operationId: someMethod
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
components:
  responses:
    Response:
      description: success
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/googleapis/gnostic-grpc/master/generator/testfiles/errors/cyclic_dependency_1.yaml#/components/schemas/Person'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: responses: "Response": content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/googleapis/gnostic-grpc/master/generator/testfiles/errors/cyclic_dependency_1.yaml#/components/schemas/Person": find schema: external base "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/googleapis/gnostic-grpc/master/generator/testfiles/errors/cyclic_dependency_1.yaml" is not supported
